c02dt.sudoku.base
Class PuzzleSet

java.lang.Object
  c02dt.sudoku.base.PuzzleSet
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Iterable<Puzzle>, java.util.Enumeration
public class PuzzleSet
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.util.Enumeration, java.lang.Iterable<Puzzle>

This class serves to hold a collection of sudoku puzzles.

Implementing enumeration it provides the puzzles one at a time so they may be passed to a solver.

Additionally the puzzle can then be passed back to the set in a different (completed) state.

          Creates a new puzzles set containing no Puzzles.

Method Detail

loadPuzzles

public boolean loadPuzzles(PuzzleLoader source,
                           java.lang.Integer number)
This method is used to `load up' a PuzzleSet object with puzzles. This is done by passing in an object which implements PuzzleLoader to provide the puzzles, and the number of them to (attempt) to load.

Parameters:
source - A PuzzleLoader object to provide a source of puzzles.
number - The number of puzzles to attempt to load.
Returns:
True if the specified number of puzzles were loaded, false if they were not.

hasMoreElements

public boolean hasMoreElements()
Returns true if the current position of this set is before the last puzzle it contains.
